# Change Log

This project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/).

## 1.1.0

-   Automated releases

## 1.0.0

-   Next 13 App Directories
-   Prettier and ESLint

-   User Authentication Using Clerk
-   Git Hooks
